title: Suzani
description: Ikat and printed lining. Chain stitch. Polychrome silk threads on bright blue silk ground. Center rectangle with two wide embroidered borders and narrow embroidered edge. Three panels, 2 adjoining velcro heading bands. Sewn to lining at regular intervals. Red cotton print lining edged with red ikat silk.
creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
